column5: I was introduced to a webpage in the Grand Caymans that has an underwater camera when looking into a winter vacation. http://www.oceanfrontiers.com/webcam.html  I then went to look at the company that made the cameras and found they had several. http://viewintotheblue.com/?page_id=418   I then went to the Florida International University and their lab has cameras inside, outside and on the divers helmets. http://aquarius.fiu.edu/currentmission/   Does anyone else have some interesting cameras?
